thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 6 of 289
thread.title: G.

author: G.
title: G.
text: I am a first time buyer with TicketCity and I am someone who normally gets anxious with purchasing something so far in advance. I purchased my tickets 5 months prior to event date, purchased September 2016 to be exact. The confirmation page noted that tickets would be available by January 2017, and I did not receive it by the date they listed. I waited about another 2 weeks (1.5 weeks out until event date). I finally sent a follow up email and asked when I should expect to receive my e-tickets. It was only once I sent a follow up did my tickets come into my inbox immediately. Response rate was excellent and I am happy that they resolved my issue immediately. Just a minor discomfort with the waiting especially since I was already technically waiting for the last 5 months. Didn't enjoy extending my anxiety for another 2 weeks, and didn't like that I needed to follow up. Otherwise, TicketCity was a good experience, I've had no other issues and any issues had were handled immediately.
